edu.cnm.deepdive.funrun.controller

Class HistoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.funrun.controller.HistoryController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/histories")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=History.class)
public class HistoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains static methods, with convenience annotations, which control the histories posted by users. Histories may be posted, deleted, and retrieved.

    • Constructor Summary

      • get

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public java.lang.Iterable<History> get(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Retrieves a collection of histories that can be iterated based on the auth.
        Parameters:
        auth - user's authentication
        Returns:
        histories by start and end descending based on user.
